title: ReplenishmentTransaction
description: Schema for a replenishment transaction including ID, transaction date, SKU ID, and units replenished.

id.description: Unique identifier for the replenishment transaction.

replenishment_id.description: Identifier linking to the replenishment event.

transaction_date.description: Date and time of the transaction in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format.

sku_id.description: Stock keeping unit (SKU) identifier for the replenished product.

units.description: Number of units replenished during the transaction.
